Translations.Text: atirikt unake, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye evan ek-doosare ko saty ka upadesh tatha dhairy ka upadesh dete rahe
vinaash ho us vyakti ka, jo kachoke lagaata rahata hai aur chaute karata rahata hai
jisane dhan ekatr kiya aur use gin-gin kar rakha
kya vah samajhata hai ki usaka dhan use sansaar mein sada rakhega
kadaapi aisa nahin hoga. vah avashy hee haî€¼utama mein phenka jaayega
aur tum kya jaano ki haî€¼utama kya hai
vah allaah kee bhadakaee huee agni hai
vah, usamen band kar diye jaayenge
kya tum nahin jaanate ki tere paalanahaar ne haathee vaale ke saath kya kiya
kya usane unakee chaal ko viphal nahin kar diya
aur unapar pankshiyon ke dal bheje
jo unapar pakee kankaree ke patthar phenk rahe the
to unhen aisa kar diya, jaise khaane ka bhoosa
